interface.name: inetd_core_service_domain
interface.summary: Define the specified domain as a inetd service.

desc.p: Define the specified domain as a inetd service. The inetd_service_domain(), inetd_tcp_service_domain(), or inetd_udp_service_domain() interfaces should be used instead of this interface, as this interface only provides the common rules to these three interfaces.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type associated with the inetd service process.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The type associated with the process program.

interface.name: inetd_tcp_service_domain
interface.summary: Define the specified domain as a TCP inetd service.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type associated with the inetd service process.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The type associated with the process program.

interface.name: inetd_udp_service_domain
interface.summary: Define the specified domain as a UDP inetd service.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type associated with the inetd service process.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The type associated with the process program.

interface.name: inetd_service_domain
interface.summary: Define the specified domain as a TCP and UDP inetd service.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type associated with the inetd service process.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The type associated with the process program.

interface.name: inetd_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use file descriptors from inetd.

interface.name: inetd_tcp_connect
interface.summary: Connect to the inetd service using a TCP connection. (Deprecated)

interface.name: inetd_domtrans_child
interface.summary: Run inetd child process in the inet child domain

interface.name: inetd_udp_send
interface.summary: Send UDP network traffic to inetd. (Deprecated)

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: inetd_rw_tcp_sockets
interface.summary: Read and write inetd TCP sockets.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
